resources.string:
Hi, my name is Khaled 

I love programming. 

I love learning new languages and building applications from scratch in Android, Python, and definitely JavaScript. 

Fun fact is that I have german shepherd named Cece. 

I enjoy exercising, and swimming too. Cycling. Weight-lifting. Running - not so much. 
And sometimes I do cross fit. 
And even less sometimes, I do mixed martial arts. 

Now I teach a class in basic programming skills as while I am developing these small Android apps. 

I'll be happy to share all of the information I have learned through Udacity, Google, and Quintrix learnings. 

You should ask me an interview question.
